text: Ani ji kasta - yatana tyala pohacali ahe, tyanantara jara amhi tyala ekhadya daya - krpeci godi cakhavito, tevha to udâ€Œgarato, mi tara yasa patra hotoca ani mala nahi vatata ki kayamata prasthapita ho'ila ani jara mala apalya palanakartyakade paratavile geleca, tarihi khatrine tyacyajavalahi majhyasathi bhala'ica asela. Nihsansaya, amhi tya kaphiranna tyancya karmansi avagata karu, ani tyanna kathora siksa - yataneci godi cakhavu
